metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the readAt function in BpMediaHTTPConnection inmedia/libmedia/IMediaHTTPConnection.cpp in the mediaserver service inAndroid before 5.1.1 LMY48I allows attackers to execute arbitrary code viaa crafted application, aka internal bug 19400722.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
